item.title: The Hidden Ones Showcases Lu Jin in New Developer Deep Dive [EXCLUSIVE]
item.description:
Described as a 3D cinematic action-fighting game, The Hidden Ones adapts the narrative, world, and characters of the martial arts franchise, The Outcast . This understandably means fans have high expectations for its roster, as these can make or break most fighting games, and the world of The Outcast is not lacking in the character department. One such character coming to The Hidden Ones is one of the Ten Masters, Lu Jin.

Game Rant can exclusively provide this deep dive look at The Hidden Ones ' take on Lu Jin, where Morefun Studios developers have leaned heavily on his Inner Demon that emerged as a result of the Heart Labors Formation. Lu Jin sought to use that fury to strike down The Fulfill and protect Longhu Mountain, and that fury is what's going to drive Lu Jin in The Hidden Ones ' gameplay. From his design to tips for his aggressive approach, Game Rant also spoke with The Hidden Ones lead designer Fox Lin.

Lu Jin [Inner Demon] - The Hidden Ones

Introduction to Lu Jin

Lu Jin Gameplay

Mocapping Lu Jin

Lu Jin [Inner Demon] is designed based on this demonized state of the character, where players will get to see not only his obsessions and hidden resentments, while also understanding his strong determination, iron will, and sense of justice. All of this is included in his gameplay, although it is the ferocity that manifests most. To no surprise, Lu Jin is a very aggressive character. He only became more aggressive throughout development, with Lin revealing,

"The first thing we decided to do was sacrifice his defensive abilities in exchange for stronger attacks. In the early stages of his development, we went for a moderate design, where a short press of the defense button would allow Lu Jin to perform a Standard move. However, after internal discussions, we decided to go all-in and fully amplify his aggressive gameplay. As a result, we decided his combat style: his defense now has a cooldown, but he is rewarded with two Standards by pressing the defense button twice consecutively in a short period. We wanted to encourage more attacking and aggressive gameplay from Lu Jin's players."

Lu Jin's Ultimate Skill Animation

This manifests in his skills as well, where players are encouraged to push that extreme aggression and almost allow players to control the battlefield for a time. Speaking about his skills, Lin said, "Skills that feature multiple dashes and the trade-off of regular defense for multiple "Thunder Talisman" Standards allow players to maintain constant pressure on their opponents." That does make his weakness clear, however: the cooldown of his defenses and the ability for the opponent to take advantage thereof. As seen below, Lin highlighted a couple of starter tips for playing as or against Lu Jin.

Lu Jin Starter Tips

  • "To master Lu Jin, players should focus on repeatedly pressing the defense button to perform his Standards, maximizing offensive advantages while utilizing Cancel in duels. When an enemy is knocked down, a short press of the defense button triggers a sweeping attack, allowing players to maintain constant pressure on their opponent."
  • "If you are playing against Lu Jin, here are some tips: Since Lu Jin has a wide array of Standards, players can capitalize on defense and counter-attack opportunities following his moves. Also, take advantage of his defense cooldown by lunging at him."

Lu Jin Victory Animation

item.title: Kingdom Hearts 4 Could Adopt the 'Dream Drop Distance' Approach for a Series First
item.description:
Kingdom Hearts 4 has the potential to break new ground by taking a page from Kingdom Hearts: Dream Drop Distance . With Sora separated from Donald and Goofy, a scenario reminiscent of Dream Drop Distance 's dual protagonist mechanic could offer an opportunity for players to control both the beloved Disney duo and the KH series' iconic hero. This could mark the first time Donald and Goofy are playable in the franchise, introducing fresh perspectives and gameplay experiences in Kingdom Hearts 4 .

The Lost Master arc signals the beginning of the end for Sora’s journey, and shifting the focus to multiple playable characters could serve as a narrative bridge to future installments. By temporarily stepping into the shoes of Donald and Goofy, players could explore the emotional stakes of the separation while navigating unique challenges. This structure would add depth to the story without diminishing Sora’s significance.

Kingdom Hearts: Dream Drop Distance Sets a Useful Precedent for KH4

Kingdom Hearts: Dream Drop Distance experimented with its dual protagonist feature by allowing players to switch between Sora and Riku. This mechanic introduced varied gameplay perspectives while maintaining narrative cohesion. Adapting a similar structure in Kingdom Hearts 4 could heighten the emotional weight of the trio's separation, encouraging players to experience their bond from different viewpoints.

For instance, a sequence where Donald and Goofy traverse a perilous landscape searching for Sora could add tension and urgency. This could even incorporate gameplay mechanics where the pair must rely on their unique abilities—Donald’s powerful magic and Goofy’s defensive prowess—to overcome challenges. Strategic character swapping might also be utilized, similar to how Riku and Sora alternated roles in Dream Drop Distance .

Disney Worlds Tailored for Donald and Goofy

One fitting Disney world for this concept could be the Alice in Wonderland setting. With its chaotic and unpredictable environment, it could reflect the confusion and determination Donald and Goofy experience while searching for Sora. Puzzles that require Goofy’s strength and Donald’s magical aptitude would add variety to exploration and combat.

Alternatively, a Toy Story world could shrink the duo to toy size, forcing them to navigate obstacles from a miniature perspective. This could allow for inventive puzzle-solving and combat scenarios while further emphasizing their reliance on teamwork. Playing as toys would not only tie in seamlessly with the whimsical Disney narrative but also enable unique gameplay mechanics, like using toy gadgets or makeshift vehicles.

Balancing Sora's Story With New Perspectives

While introducing playable Donald and Goofy segments could provide novelty, the structure should avoid overshadowing Sora’s central arc. A well-balanced approach would see the duo's sections as interludes that provide context and emotional depth, rather than consuming significant portions of the story. For example, their perspective could highlight the toll of separation, reinforcing the stakes of the narrative without diluting Sora’s role.

Additionally, moments of crossover where players reunite the trio could offer emotional payoffs. Cinematic cutscenes or special abilities that merge the party's strengths might further emphasize their bond. This approach aligns with Kingdom Hearts 4 's potential to serve as a transitional chapter, acknowledging the legacy of Sora while building narrative foundations for the future.

With the Lost Master arc underway, Kingdom Hearts 4 could explore storytelling innovations that pay homage to its predecessors while carving out fresh experiences. By drawing inspiration from Dream Drop Distance , it could give fans a long-awaited opportunity to step into the shoes of Donald and Goofy, making their iconic friendship even more tangible.

item.title: Roblox: Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs List (March 2025)
item.description:
Combat Warriors is similar to many other Roblox shooters, but it is especially addictive and fun because of its fast pace. In fact, someone dies here almost every second, so the developers decided to add kill sounds to diversify the gameplay. Roblox players interested in a complete list of Combat Warriors kill sound IDs can find it below.

Updated March 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Customizing your kill sounds in Combat Warriors can add a personal touch to the game. With the right ID, you can make every elimination more satisfying. Stay tuned for updates, as new sounds are frequently added. Make sure to grab your favorites while they’re still available.

All Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs (Combat Warriors Codes)

Combat Warriors has recently gained wide popularity, and players have fallen in love with this game because of its action and drive. The developers are eager to support this project and add various maps and new features, including more Kill Sound IDs. This article is constantly updated to provide players with all the latest information. Below, fans can find a list of Kill Sound IDs:

How to Redeem Kill Shound IDs in Combat Warriors

Redemption of Kill Sound IDs in Combat Warriors is a very simple task. However, if players are still having problems, this step-by-step guide should help to solve them. They should keep in mind though that to unlock the ability to redeem a Kill Sound ID, players will need to pay 199 Robux.

  • Open Roblox and launch Combat Warriors.
  • In the main menu of the game, find the settings.
  • Click on it.
  • Go to the "Audio" tab.
  • Enter the above IDs in the "Kill Sound ID" field.

Combat Warriors Tips and Tricks

To begin with, players need to learn how to move correctly, slide, dash, stomp, and so on, which will lead to success. The next step is to master the combat mechanics. It's not that difficult. Players just need to hit the enemy at the right moment. Completing daily quests is also a key to success, as these quests offer in-game currency with which players can buy new weapons.

Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Combat Warriors

One of the best things about Roblox is the huge variety of games on offer. This bodes well for those who are starting to get bored of their favorite Roblox games, as there are usually plenty of great alternatives just waiting to be discovered. Below, players can learn about the five best Roblox games like Combat Warriors :

  • Project Slayers
  • A One Piece Game
  • Arsenal
  • Dragon Blox
  • Base Battles

About the Combat Warriors Developers

The developers of Combat Warriors never released any other games. But, their group in Roblox already has more than 900K members, and this only indicates the good quality of the project and the hard work of the developers.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance - Best Mods, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Warhorse Studios' Kingdom Come: Deliverance is a commendable but imperfect open-world RPG.
  • Fans can enhance gameplay with mods like immersive archery, armor balance, and sectorial lockpicking.
  • Unofficial mods address gameplay issues, such as realism, inventory management, and combat difficulty.

The fact that Warhorse Studios decided upon an extremely ambitious and realistic open-world medieval RPG as their first game is something that needs to be commended. In this context, Kingdom Come: Deliverance is easily one of the greatest achievements of any gaming studio, with the game being a highly enjoyable — if somewhat buggy — romp from start to end. That being said, there's no denying the fact that Kingdom Come is not a perfect experience by any stretch of the imagination, but fans who want to mitigate the annoyances of this title can end up integrating a whole host of mods that can optimize and improve the overall experience of this title in many ways.

There's no denying that Kingdom Come: Deliverance has its fair share of issues that hold it back from being a truly great game. However, for a first effort, Warhorse Studios has certainly done an incredible job with this game, and fans can't wait to see what the sequel has in store for them. The sky's the limit for this studio, and players can always integrate their fair share of Kingdom Come: Deliverance mods into the first game if the wait for the second chapter is proving to be a bit too agonizing for their liking.

Updated March 23, 2025, by Rhenn Taguiam: Players who loved Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 might be wondering how it compares to Kingdom Come: Deliverance . After all, the first game is the tale that started everything. And while the second game is definitely a step up compared to the older entry across all departments, Deliverance can become quite a worthwhile experience with the right mods. Although the game is already known for its splash of realism, some mods amplify the experience further. These include those that deliver more accurate time-keeping, add color to feathers, rebalance armor, and even overhaul the combat system.

34 Medii Temporis

Downloads: 1,553

  • Creator: ilya1502
  • Download Link

Players who want to add a better sense of realism to their Kingdom Come: Deliverance gameplay can switch to a more lore-accurate clock instead of just a thematically stylized time-keeping device. With Medii Temporis , fans can experience the way people in the Middle Ages looked at time: not in the form of seconds, minutes, or hours, but based on things they observed. Back then, this was all about where the sun is currently positioned, how green (or yellow, or dead) the leaves were, etc.

While these elements are too dynamic for an all-encompassing Kingdom Come mod, Medii Temporis does this by eliminating the core numbers of the in-game clock. Instead, players now determine time by the position of the sun, daily events, and church bells. There will be challenges for precise time prediction in the Monastery and other locations. For players who want more unique timekeeping methods, there are optional versions with church-based canonical hours or Roman-based timekeeping.

33 Colored Arrow Feathers

Downloads: 25,304

  • Creator: lucas182
  • Download Link

Archery is quite a useful skill, especially if Henry is built to be somewhat weak when engaging foes at close quarters. With the right aim, Henry can take down enemies from quite afar. Unfortunately, one large caveat of archery is the scarcity of arrows. Henry has the option to retrieve arrows that miss…provided he can find them.

With Colored Arrow Feathers , this task is much easier. When installed, the mod gives all arrows four different feather colors depending on their status. Pink and Red Arrows denote levels of piercing, Cyan is higher-quality, Blue is for wounding, and everything else is Yellow. This way, players can search the ground for their arrows and retrieve them faster.

32 Armor Balance Overhaul

Downloads: 959

  • Creator: machinegod420
  • Download Link

Given the weight and coverage of plate armor, it makes sense for a fully-armored knight to be nigh impervious in combat. Unfortunately, the general difficulty of combat in Kingdom Come: Deliverance doesn’t offer a lot of opportunities to showcase the strengths of these armors. With Armor Balance Overhaul , players can finally be more flexible with their defensive choices, which can be important for those who want to be more immersive in the game.

The mod boosts the defensive rating of all the existing armor in the game. That way, gambesons and other lighter armor are more viable as protective options, which is crucial when players need something cheaper and lighter for travel. Likewise, plate has become much stronger, making it a more worthwhile investment despite its setbacks.

31 Combat Gameplay Overhaul

Downloads: 632

  • Creator: machinegod420
  • Download Link

Players who think Kingdom Come: Deliverance is already difficult should consider applying the Combat Gameplay Overhaul , which switches things up to make the game feel like a completely different title. This will force AI and even players to stay away from the game’s rather methodic block-riposte dynamic. Instead, it encourages them to change zones more often and even become more aggressive.

Not only that, dodging is also more realistic, this time disallowing players to dodge as far as ten feet to avoid having to block. And speaking of blocking, players now need to match the direction of the attack in order to score perfect blocks, making fights more meaningful and challenging.

30 No Mo’ Slow

Downloads: 57,291

  • Creator: Raok
  • Download Link

In Kingdom Come: Deliverance gameplay, players have the opportunity to execute Perfect Blocks by way of slow-motion. If they block at the perfect moment, they can perform a Perfect Block and leave opponents ripe for the taking. However, tackling the timing of such a situation in high-intense combat can seem too difficult for some players. Making this timing more manageable can help players either challenge themselves further or make a smoother gameplay experience - something No Mo' Slow an ideal mod to use.

At its core, No Mo' Slow simply gives players a new console command they can use to manually control the Perfect Block's slow motion instance. They can speed it up, slow it down, or remove it completely - allowing players to customize these parameters to fit their preferred experience.

29 Unlimited Saving

Downloads: 668,549

  • Creator: EddieShoe
  • Download Link

Being a survival game, it makes sense of Kingdom Come: Deliverance to share mechanics with other titles like Rust or ARK where players need to manage their character's stats in order to survive. However, what makes Kingdom Come so surprising is how it also adapts a popular survival mechanic in the original Resident Evil series - where players can't necessarily save the game wherever they like. In fact, players can only save if they either sleep in a bed that they own or drink a Saviour Schnapps. A recent patch also allowed a Save and Quit option, but this isn't ideal at times when players just want a surefire way of getting back on track if they do a wrong decision.

Thanks to Unlimited Saving , players now have the ability to save anywhere they want in the game. The mod doesn't bypass areas where players aren't allowed to save, however. This still transforms Kingdom Come: Deliverance into a more manageable experience.

28 Bow Dot Reticle

Downloads: 493,924

  • Creator: FoX_D3ff3nd3R
  • Download Link

Fans might be surprised to find out that their Bow will be missing the viewing reticle whenever they draw it in Kingdom Come: Deliverance gameplay, which might strike some as an odd decision. However, the game's commitment to realism explains this design choice, as the devs may have wanted players to feel as though drawing a Bow to attack from afar should be just as calculated, careful, and potentially difficult as it is in real life. Fans of FPS might not appreciate this change, as having a reticle is useful in determining targets.

This is where Bow Dot Reticle comes in. This simple mod simply restores the reticle whenever players draw their Bow, allowing them some degree of freedom as to where they aim and provide them a means of trying to be accurate in their shots. While some might find issue with this in terms of overall realism, players who want to create hyper-focused builds in Kingdom Come: Deliverance may appreciate this change.

27 Trough Washing Deluxe

Downloads: 94,885

  • Creator: EddieShoe
  • Download Link

Taking a bath is an important part of Kingdom Come: Deliverance gameplay, as hygiene can affect the player's overall health throughout the title. As they may have noticed, the Bath and the Trough are available to help clean players, but the base game will only have the Baths as the surefire way to achieve 100% Cleanliness while Troughs do this for a small amount.

Thanks to Trough Washing Deluxe , players no longer have to worry about this distinction. Going to a Trough will now restore them to maximum Cleanliness everytime, allowing players to worry less about this particular stat - especially if they have a tendency to get their hands dirty (and quite literally, in this case).

26 Henry's Hair Color Customization

Downloads: 7,953

  • Created by: Grimsyxd
  • Download Link

Kingdom Come: Deliverance is an RPG where players control a pre-defined character, which is an approach that many other titles in the genre have taken, too. However, some would've still loved the option of customizing Henry's look to a certain extent.

This mod is self-explanatory and allows players to customize Henry's hair color, which can change how this character looks in a fresh and meaningful way. It may seem like a small tweak, but those who've stared at vanilla Henry's mug for hours on end will know just how valuable these cosmetic mods can be.

25 Yet Another Sorting Mod

Downloads: 19,784

  • Created by: Drake0713, TheVoidKnight, and Haslam
  • Download Link

There are many complaints that players have shared when it comes to the lack of a proper inventory sorting system in the game. Items blend whenever players open the menu, which can become grating after a point. Given the nature of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 's gameplay, it's important for item management to be as seamless as possible so that the very act of rifling through Henry's possessions isn't something that players dread the more they play through a game that can last more than a hundred hours.

There are many mods available to download that do a halfway decent job of sorting the inventory, with this one being pretty comprehensive in its own right. It learns from everything that other sorting mods have attempted, making for a much better look at Henry's inventory whenever players open up his pouch.

24 Translucent Helmet Vision

Downloads: 24,108

  • Created by: JustAnOrdinaryGuy
  • Download Link

While it might be somewhat realistic to have Henry's vision be blocked every single time he wears a helmet in combat, there's no denying that this helmet vision can get annoying quickly in battle due to the limited field of vision that the player is restricted by. Thankfully, there's a solution that gamers can opt for that serves as the perfect middle ground.

There might be a mod to remove this helmet vision completely, but players who don't want to compromise on this sense of realism can choose to opt for the Translucent Helmet Vision instead, which ends up being the perfect way to enjoy the combat of the game without sacrificing the realistic side of things.

23 Easier Enemies

Downloads: 27,324

  • Created by: Youcef
  • Download Link

The combat in Kingdom Come: Deliverance can be a pain to get through in the early stages. Enemies block attacks all the time and punish Henry for overcommitting to a strike. Even after getting basic combat training, it takes a few levels and powerful equipment before players can hold their own in a one-versus-many scenario. The duels in this game can be quite cinematic and engaging, but the combat system falls apart when players have to fight groups, which can add to the frustration of the battles in this game.

This is why a lot of players would prefer to download a Kingdom Come: Deliverance mod that reduces the difficulty of these encounters. The Easier Enemies mod is an obvious recommendation here, letting players reduce the difficulty of these foes and taking away their ability to use master strikes. It may seem like a cheat, but those who are struggling to get into this experience and don't want their hard-earned progress to be wiped out because of a single mistake will love the changes this mod brings to the table.

22 Quicksave

Downloads: 28,839

  • Created by: Davipb
  • Download Link

Props should be given to Warhorse Studios for going forward with a bold approach of not letting players save unless they ingest the valuable Savior Schnapps or retire for the day. This old-school approach makes players think twice before attempting something risky, but it comes at the cost of players finding it a bit too intimidating to even check this game out given how challenging the early portion already is.

Thankfully, fans have come to save the day with a simple Kingdom Come: Deliverance mod that lets players save with a simple press of the F5 button. It may go against the spirit of the game, but most players won't mind as long as they are free to take risks and enjoy the game instead of constantly second-guessing their decisions.

21 Immersive Archery

Downloads: 30,736

  • Created by: GalaxyES
  • Download Link

Archery was pretty much a medieval cheat code that people whipped out at a moment's notice to get the edge in battle, and Henry should've been able to take out most of his enemies with a single well-placed arrow. While it's true that he may not have had the archery skills that most veterans boasted, there's no excusing the slow draw and flight speed of the arrows in the game.

Immersive Archery aims to rectify this form of combat to make it easier to bear for players. Henry draws the bowstring faster, arrows fly at a swifter pace, stamina drain is reduced, and the damage of arrows is also considerably increased. Instead of being a chore, archery becomes fun with the inclusion of this mod.

20 Polearms Unleashed

Downloads: 31,572

  • Created by: machinegod420
  • Download Link

There are many weapons that players can use in Kingdom Come: Deliverance . Players don't have to restrict themselves to using only swords and shields; the wealth of two-handed weapons adding some variety to the game. However, some people feel like these weapons aren't as fleshed out as Henry's one-handed armaments, with the polearm being a great example of a weapon whose full potential isn't reached in the vanilla game.

With this mod, a polearm becomes a blast to use against enemies who have no response for the parries, feints, jabs, and strikes that Henry can whip out once he's adept at using this weapon. The move set is a glorious way to celebrate the legacy of the polearm, which is easily one of the most underrated weapons used in medieval times.

19 Increase Inventory Capacity

Downloads: 32,214

  • Created by: Christian A
  • Download Link

Getting encumbered is the bane of any RPG player's existence, and Kingdom Come: Deliverance is no exception here. The title is already challenging enough without players having to engage with clunky inventory management where they're forced to drop valuable items so that Henry isn't moving at a snail's pace.

With a single Kingdom Come: Deliverance mod , this issue become a thing of the past. Players can carry whatever they want without fear of being encumbered, allowing them to hold on to as many items as possible before offloading them for a tidy sum and turning the humble son of a blacksmith into one of the richest men in the game.

18 Enhanced Hair Textures

Downloads: 34,139

  • Created by: Grimsy
  • Download Link

Kingdom Come: Deliverance is a game that doesn't break a lot of ground in the visual department. Sure, there are some stunning sights to be found in the open world, but the level of detail most people expect from a high-budget video game is absent, which is understandable. Still, that shouldn't take away anything from this game, which is as engaging as they come.

That being said, some mods focus on various aspects of the game's visuals, with this one ensuring that the hairdos of characters aren't too low quality. It's not a major change, but those who are sticklers for every visual detail will love how well this mod works in comparison with other visual improvements for Kingdom Come: Deliverance .

17 Enhanced Eyes

Downloads: 38,554

  • Created by: Grimsy
  • Download Link

The uncanny valley is a real thing, and it does a marvelous job of pulling players out of their immersion as they remember that, at the end of the day, they're playing a video game. Watching a face stare lifelessly in the distance no matter how much of the animation budget is poured into making characters look as realistic as possible is an issue that is bound to hit games as they age, and Kingdom Come: Deliverance is no exception here.

So, it's only a given that any mod that enhances the eyes of characters in the game world will be one that fans will appreciate. The high-budget mo-capped animations of Kingdom Come: Deliverance may get the job done in the majority of instances, but this mod is perfect for the in-engine cutscenes where characters can look a bit too wooden at times.

16 Remove Those Stupid Trails

Downloads: 116,478

  • Created by: Mugs
  • Download Link

Archery is easily one of the hardest skills to master in Kingdom Come: Deliverance . The lack of a crosshair while aiming an arrow is bad enough as is, but the ugly trails that follow every flying arrow are somehow even worse.

Thankfully, this particular mod ensures that these arrow trails become a thing of the past. That way, at least ranged combat will become less of an eyesore, especially since the arrow trails don't serve a gameplay purpose in the eyes of many.

15 Easy To See Herbs

Downloads: 139,582

  • Created by: Lucas182
  • Download Link

Alchemy plays a big role in Kingdom Come: Deliverance . Even if players don't brew too many potions, picking herbs is important to finish quests or sell for a quick buck if players require some gold.

So, it's odd that the herbs in the game are so devilishly hard to find that players can genuinely blow a gasket trying to find these plants in the overworld. Thankfully, this mod takes care of the issue by making the game's herbs easy to locate visually, which goes a long way in ensuring that players don't interact with random bits of foliage every single time they think they've spotted some herbs.

item.title: Roblox: Baddies Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Baddies Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Baddies
  • How to Get More Baddies Codes

Baddies is an open-world RPG where you can do literally anything. If you want to be a blogger, you're welcome to do so, or if you want to be a bad guy, that's also easy, but the only thing that can stop you is a lack of cash.

But like most other Roblox games, in Baddies you can redeem codes to make your life easier. By doing so, you'll get a bunch of freebies, including cash, outfits, and other accessories that will help you become more popular and cooler.

Updated March 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: If you're looking for exclusive cosmetics in Baddies , you're in luck. Right now, there's only one active code to redeem. Claim the Treasure Chest Purse Skin while it's still available. Stay tuned for future updates, as more rewards may drop soon.

All Baddies Codes

Working Baddies Codes

  • Baddies - Redeem this code to get Treasure Chest Purse Skin.

Expired Baddies Codes

There are currently no expired Baddies codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Baddies codes is one of the easiest ways to quickly gain success in the game. In just a few seconds, you'll get a bunch of freebies and be able to dictate the rules to those who used to despise you, so hurry up.

How to Redeem Codes for Baddies

Redeeming Baddies codes is as easy as in most other Roblox experiences and will take you a few clicks. If you haven't redeemed codes before, or don't understand how to do it specifically in Baddies , here's a detailed guide to help you figure it out:

  • Launch Baddies .
  • Pay attention to the upper right corner of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the third one, which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a yellow Claim Reward button. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned working codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the yellow Claim Reward button to submit your reward request.

If everything went well, a notification will appear above the redemption menu with a list of rewards received. If it didn't work, make sure you didn't make any mistakes when entering the code manually, or insert an extra space when copy-pasting it.

How to Get More Baddies Codes

If the rewards you have received are not enough and you want to get more Baddies codes, you can find them on the official social networks of the game. By attentively monitoring the latest updates and news, you may be lucky enough to find new Roblox codes:

  • Official Baddies Roblox group.
  • Official Baddies Discord server.
  • Official Baddies X account.
